effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

flavorTexts.text:
The user attacks by engulfing the target in an
intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave
the target with a burn.
